actions.name: Fury Cutter
actions.description: Effect: For each consecutive time this attack hits after the first, Fury Cutter's Power doubles, up to a maximum base Power of 160. Fury Cutter's Power resets if the user is switched out, @Affliction[fainted], combat ends or an item is used on the user.
